scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei and Omaru Polka talk and take photos together in a scenic sunset environment with cherry blossoms.
Mumei returns to her treehouse and introduces her new 3D showcase merchandise, a silicone lantern.
Transition from the treehouse to a dark, ruined forest stage for the final song performance.
Nanashi Mumei performs the song 'Binary Star' on the forest stage.

subtitles.original: うちは… 今日は、うーん…
subtitles.english: I'm... for today, hmm...

subtitles.original:
But first actually, how about a photo?
Do you want to take a photo?
subtitles.english:
But first actually, how about a photo?
Do you want to take a photo?

subtitles.original: Hey girl, look! 写真？ 写真！
subtitles.english: Hey girl, look! Photo? Photo!

subtitles.original: 写真！
subtitles.english: Photo!

subtitles.original: 写真！ Picture!
subtitles.english: Photo! Picture!

subtitles.original: Let's take a photo!
subtitles.english: Let's take a photo!

subtitles.original: Okay! Okay, one second.
subtitles.english: Okay! Okay, one second.

subtitles.original: 本当は痛いんだよな お前
subtitles.english: Truth is, it hurts, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 我慢してるんだよな
subtitles.english: You're holding it in, aren't you?

subtitles.original: Alright, ready?
subtitles.english: Alright, ready?

subtitles.original: Ready... せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready... Go!

subtitles.original: Cheeeeeese!
subtitles.english: Cheeeeeese!

subtitles.original: Phew! One more? One more!
subtitles.english: Phew! One more? One more!

subtitles.original: One more, one more!
subtitles.english: One more, one more!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, go!

subtitles.original: Cheese!
subtitles.english: Cheese!

subtitles.original: Perfect! Perfect!
subtitles.english: Perfect! Perfect!

subtitles.original: Ah, thank you Polka-senpai!
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you Polka-senpai!

subtitles.original: 聞いてくれてありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Thank you very much for listening!

subtitles.original: Thank you, thank you! Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Polka, ね、帰ろっか？
subtitles.english: Polka, hey, shall we go home?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、大丈夫…
subtitles.english: It's okay, it's okay...

subtitles.original: Yeah, Mumei hug! Oh!
subtitles.english: Yeah, Mumei hug! Oh!

subtitles.original: Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: She'll be fine. She'll be fine, it's okay.
subtitles.english: She'll be fine. She'll be fine, it's okay.

subtitles.original:
Um, you know, I have some
more announcements to give you guys.
subtitles.english:
Um, you know, I have some
more announcements to give you guys.

subtitles.original:
Uh, let's go to the treehouse
and I'll tell you there.
subtitles.english:
Uh, let's go to the treehouse
and I'll tell you there.

subtitles.original: Ta-ta-ta... oh, not that way. Ta-ta-ta...
subtitles.english: Ta-ta-ta... oh, not that way. Ta-ta-ta...

subtitles.original: Tada! We're back in the treehouse.
subtitles.english: Tada! We're back in the treehouse.

subtitles.original:
I thought we could warm ourselves up a little bit
just before the last song.
subtitles.english:
I thought we could warm ourselves up a little bit
just before the last song.

subtitles.original: Sure would be nice to have a fire outside.
subtitles.english: Sure would be nice to have a fire outside.

subtitles.original: Contained.
subtitles.english: Contained.

subtitles.original: You know, contained in something.
subtitles.english: You know, contained in something.

subtitles.original:
And then it could produce a light source and it could
guide us to a hot spring or a volcano or something.
subtitles.english:
And then it could produce a light source and it could
guide us to a hot spring or a volcano or something.

subtitles.original: Hmm, what could we get that would be like that?
subtitles.english: Hmm, what could we get that would be like that?

subtitles.original: Oh duh! My lantern! Oh how silly of me.
subtitles.english: Oh duh! My lantern! Oh how silly of me.

subtitles.original: It's so handy-dandy for such things.
subtitles.english: It's so handy-dandy for such things.

subtitles.original: You guys don't have one, do you?
subtitles.english: You guys don't have one, do you?

subtitles.original: Suckers.
subtitles.english: Suckers.

subtitles.original:
Just kidding. You're in luck,
because now I can offer you...
subtitles.english:
Just kidding. You're in luck,
because now I can offer you...

subtitles.original: A lantern of your own! Just like mine!
subtitles.english: A lantern of your own! Just like mine!

subtitles.original:
Wow! Incredible! That's right,
merchandise! It's merchandise time.
subtitles.english:
Wow! Incredible! That's right,
merchandise! It's merchandise time.

subtitles.original: Mumei's Lantern
subtitles.english: Mumei's Lantern

subtitles.original: Um, yes, you can get a lantern like mine.
subtitles.english: Um, yes, you can get a lantern like mine.

subtitles.original: Except this one's made of silicone.
subtitles.english: Except this one's made of silicone.

subtitles.original: And there's no fire.
subtitles.english: And there's no fire.

subtitles.original:
And it doesn't produce heat,
so it's not hot to the touch.
subtitles.english:
And it doesn't produce heat,
so it's not hot to the touch.

subtitles.original:
But it produces light! That's pretty
nice, right? That's pretty nice.
subtitles.english:
But it produces light! That's pretty
nice, right? That's pretty nice.

subtitles.original:
You can put it next to your bed,
you can put it on your desk...
subtitles.english:
You can put it next to your bed,
you can put it on your desk...

subtitles.original:
Anywhere you need a little
extra light in your... in your life.
subtitles.english:
Anywhere you need a little
extra light in your... in your life.

subtitles.original: It can protect you from monsters in your closet.
subtitles.english: It can protect you from monsters in your closet.

subtitles.original:
Or it can show you whatever's watching you
in the dark... or you don't really need it for that, right?
subtitles.english:
Or it can show you whatever's watching you
in the dark... or you don't really need it for that, right?

subtitles.original: But yeah, lantern! Just like mine!
subtitles.english: But yeah, lantern! Just like mine!

subtitles.original: If you want it, yes, 3D merchandise!
subtitles.english: If you want it, yes, 3D merchandise!

subtitles.original:
Who could have expected? Oh my god.
Yes, I'm the best at... at shilling. Okay.
subtitles.english:
Who could have expected? Oh my god.
Yes, I'm the best at... at shilling. Okay.

subtitles.original:
Anyways, yes, please feel free
to get one if you need it, if you want it.
subtitles.english:
Anyways, yes, please feel free
to get one if you need it, if you want it.

subtitles.original: Oh god. Okay. That's it for the merchandise.
subtitles.english: Oh god. Okay. That's it for the merchandise.

subtitles.original: But I got one more song for you guys.
subtitles.english: But I got one more song for you guys.

subtitles.original:
Shall I go do it? Shall I go... go there to do it?
I'll do that.
subtitles.english:
Shall I go do it? Shall I go... go there to do it?
I'll do that.

subtitles.original: Let's go! Follow me! Let's go, let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go! Follow me! Let's go, let's go!

subtitles.original: Ta-ta-ta... oh so pretty! Oh nice!
subtitles.english: Ta-ta-ta... oh so pretty! Oh nice!

subtitles.original: Binary Star
subtitles.english: Binary Star

subtitles.original: In a turbulence star
subtitles.english: In a turbulence star

subtitles.original: We can see from afar
subtitles.english: We can see from afar

subtitles.original: But a truth it divides
subtitles.english: But a truth it divides

subtitles.original: All the interest it dies
subtitles.english: All the interest it dies

subtitles.original: Hear the beating of wings
subtitles.english: Hear the beating of wings

subtitles.original: As the pendulum swings
subtitles.english: As the pendulum swings

subtitles.original: And we can't believe it's ever gonna end
subtitles.english: And we can't believe it's ever gonna end

subtitles.original: You know birds are the curve in the water
subtitles.english: You know birds are the curve in the water

subtitles.original: We would just want everyone to get along
subtitles.english: We would just want everyone to get along

subtitles.original: Or the candles in the darkness
subtitles.english: Or the candles in the darkness

subtitles.original: Burning out the sorrow
subtitles.english: Burning out the sorrow

subtitles.original: There's no end to sadness
subtitles.english: There's no end to sadness
